name: Visible Property 2
description:
This plugin will update the text follow reference's properties whenever it is modified.


üêº Video Tutorial

  • Youtube: https://youtu.be/PEC56gILBMA


üê∑ How it works:


  1. Define reference element by add "#" in front of layer name. For example #color
  2. Defile text element you want to update (#reference + . + method) For example #color.fill, #color.fillRGB, #color.height etc.
  3. call plugin by "cmd + /" -> "visible property 2"


ü¶Å Properties:


Fill

  • fill -> #123456
  • fillRGB -> r:123 g:456 b:789
  • fillHSL -> h:123 s:456 l:789
  • fillStyle -> DarkBlue


Stroke

  • stroke -> #123456
  • strokeRGB -> r:123 g:456 b:789
  • strokeHSL -> h:123 s:456 l:789
  • strokeStyle -> DarkBlue


Text

  • font -> Roboto
  • fontWeight -> Bold
  • fontSize -> 12
  • paragraphIndent -> 12
  • paragraphSpace -> 12
  • letterSpace -> 12 or 12%
  • lineHeight -> 12 or 12%
  • textStyle -> Body


Size

  • height -> 32
  • width -> 64


Component
